name: Kael

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally HP in all Battles by 15%.

skills.name: Dark Bolt
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has an 80% chance of placing a 2.5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Damage +10%

skills.name: Acid Rain
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has an extra 15% chance of inflicting a critical killed.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%

skills.name: Disintegrate
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 4 times at random. Has a 40% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1
